NVIDIA High-End Ada Lovelace Released 2024-01-31

NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER

The RTX 4080 SUPER offers excellent 4K gaming performance with 16GB VRAM. As 50-series cards arrive, the 4080 SUPER presents strong value on the used market for those who don't need the latest generation.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER good for gaming?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER scores 82/100 at 1080p, 83/100 at 1440p, and 76/100 at 4K in our gaming benchmarks. It is best suited for 4k gaming and content creation.

What is the price of the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER has an MSRP of $999 and is currently available for approximately $899.

How much VRAM does the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER have?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER has 16GB of GDDR6X memory on a 256-bit memory bus, providing ample memory for 4K gaming, content creation, and AI workloads.

What power supply do I need for the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER has a TDP of 320W. We recommend a minimum 750W power supply. It uses a 1x 16-pin (600W) power connector.
